c74object.name: ears.mc.out~
c74object.digest: Signal output for a patch loaded by ears.process~
c74object.description: Use the ears.mc.out~ object inside a patch loaded by ears.process~ to create a multichannel signal outlet writing data to an output buffer.

metadatalist.metadata: Andrea Agostini, partly based upon work by Alexander J. Harker

objarg.name: outlet
objarg.description: The number of the outlet of ears.process~ (conted from 1, starting from the leftmost) to which buffer contents are to be passed. It corresponds to the outlet attribute, default is 1.

objarg.name: first_channel
objarg.description: The first channel of the output buffer It corresponds to the inlet attribute, default is 1.

objarg.name: channels
objarg.description: How many channels, starting from the value of the second argument or the firstchannel attribute, must be written to the buffer. The default is 0, meaning that the all the incoming channels will be written.

attribute.name: chans
attribute.description: Sets how many channels, starting from the value of the firstchannel attribute, must be written to the buffer. The default is 0, meaning that the all the incoming channels will be written.

attribute.name: firstchannel
attribute.description: Sets the first channel of the output buffer.

attribute.name: outlet
attribute.description: Sets the number of the outlet of ears.process~ (conted from 1, starting from the leftmost) to which buffer contents are to be passed.
